landingTitle: Financial Clarity for Filipino Small Enterprises
landingSubtitle: PesoProsperity is a simple, beginner-friendly budgeting system designed to empower small enterprises in the Philippines. Plan your finances, control costs, and manage cash flow with ease.
toolkitTitle: A toolkit for your business's success
toolkitSubtitle: Everything you need to make informed financial decisions.
featureFinancialPlanningDescription: Set goals, create monthly budgets, and review your financial plans regularly to stay on track.
featureCostControlDescription: Compare budgeted amounts with actual expenses and get alerts when you're overspending.
featureCashFlowDescription: Use simple forecasts and a debt tracker to manage your cash flow effectively.
createAnAccountDescription: Join us to start managing your finances.
loggedOutSuccess: You have been successfully logged out.
supportDescription: Here are some quick tips on how to use the main features of PesoProsperity.
supportFinancialPlanning: Use the "Financial Goals" section to set and track long-term objectives like buying new equipment. The "Budget Planner" allows you to create monthly budgets manually or get suggestions from our AI by uploading your financial data.
supportTransactions: In the "Transactions" page, you can manually log every income and expense. This gives you a detailed record of all financial activities.
supportCostControl: The "Variance Analysis" report compares your budgeted amounts against your actual spending, highlighting where you are over or under budget. Use the "Recurring" section to manage regular, automated payments and income to avoid missing them.
supportCashFlow: The "Statement" provides a month-by-month summary of your cash inflows and outflows, showing your running balance. The "Debt Tracker" helps you monitor and manage your liabilities to improve your financial health.
supportReports: Generate detailed CSV reports for "Income vs. Expense", "Budget Variance", and your "Cash Flow Statement" for any date range to get deeper insights into your business finances.
supportSettings: In the "Settings" page, you can update your profile information, including your name and profile picture.
guestDataSavedTemporarily: Your data will be saved temporarily.
